          <title>
            <string language="sl">Naboj in Coulombov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">Charge and Coulomb's Law</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung und des Coulombs Gesetz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loi de charge et de coulomb</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Postavljanje delcev z nabojem in medsebojne privlačne/odbojne sile.</string>
            <string language="en">Placing the charged particles on a canvas and observation of resulting forces.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="en">physlet</string>

Segeltuch und eine Beobachtung der resultierenden Kräfte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Placement des particules chargées sur une toile 
et une observation des forces résultantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colocando as partículas carregadas em uma lona e
em uma observação de forças resultantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Disponendo le particelle caricate su una tela di

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τοποθέτηση των χρεωμένων μορίων σε έναν καμβά και μια
παρατήρηση των προκυπτουσών δυνάμεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poner las partículas cargadas en una lona y una 
observación de fuerzas que resultan.</string>
